events.title: Trump marries Ivana Zelníčková
events.description: Donald Trump marries Ivana Zelníčková, a model from Czechoslovakia.

events.title: Trump opens Grand Hyatt New York
events.description: Trump completes his first major Manhattan real estate project, the Grand Hyatt New York.

events.title: Trump Tower opens
events.description: Trump Tower opens on Fifth Avenue in Manhattan.

events.title: Trump opens Harrah's at Trump Plaza
events.description: Trump opens his first casino in Atlantic City.

events.title: Trump meets Soviet Ambassador Dubinin
events.description: Soviet Ambassador Yuri Dubinin meets Trump and flatters him on Trump Tower, beginning cultivation.

events.title: Trump visits Moscow
events.description: Trump and Ivana travel to Moscow at the invitation of the Soviet government to discuss hotel projects.

events.title: Trump places political ads
events.description: Shortly after Moscow trip, Trump places full-page ads in major newspapers criticizing US defense spending.

events.title: Trump purchases Plaza Hotel
events.description: Trump purchases the Plaza Hotel in New York for $407 million.

events.title: Trump bails out of Soviet hotel deal
events.description: Trump signs a deal with two Moscow agencies to develop a hotel project, but later backs out.

events.title: Trump faces financial troubles
events.description: Trump faces severe financial difficulties with his Atlantic City casinos and other properties.

events.title: Trump Casino bankruptcy
events.description: Trump's Taj Mahal casino files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy.
